A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is weak. I had such high hopes for this franchise\, but instead of mining the rich mythology for a new and compelling story we are stuck with plodding nonsense plot\, emasculated heroes\, another wasted super powered villain\, and winning \"supreme commander. There were some inspiring moments punctuated by flattening humor and overwhelming doubt and disappointment. This movie was simply confusing mess. You'd be better off staying home and watching the un-digitally altered originals.
